title: Delivery Driver
shortDescription: Deliver organic products to our customers around Bishkek.
fullDescription: As a Delivery Driver, you'll be responsible for transporting our organic goods safely and on time to local customers. This role requires excellent time management and customer service skills.

title: Bakery Assistant
shortDescription: Assist in baking our signature sourdough bread.
fullDescription: Work directly with our bakers to prepare, shape, and bake organic sourdough breads. This is a hands-on role for someone who loves food and teamwork.

title: Robot Human Assistant
shortDescription: Oversee and control up to 10 robots to keep operations running smoothly.
fullDescription: As a Robot Human Assistant, you’ll be responsible for remotely managing up to 10 robots to carry out various tasks in our eco-factories or organic farms. This role requires fast reflexes, problem-solving ability, and independent decision-making. You’ll also report technical or operational issues to the supervisor team.
